title: VTS Kit Angular Schematic
description: Creates a new, generic class definition in the given or default project.

path.description: The path at which to create the class file, relative to 'shared' or 'libs' folder. Default mode is set to `libs`
path.x-prompt: Where to create new class, relative to 'shared' or 'libs' folder (default set to create 'libs' class, use option --shared to create shared class)?

name.description: The name of the new class.
name.x-prompt: What name would you like to use for the class?

shared.description: Specifies whether to create shared service.

skipTests.description: Do not create "spec.ts" test files for the new class.

type.description: Adds a developer-defined type to the filename, in the format "name.type.ts".
